name: Final Tableau 1
description:
Final Tableau 1 is a turn-based combat game with one level.

Some stuff you might wanna know:
  1. when the text says you are blocking ...... from ...... it means you blocked an attack
  2. when the text glitches it means you blocked two attacks.
  3.  the orange bar above is your special attack bar used it when its full
  4. the enemies have a weakness to a certain attack.
  5. you cant see the entire red enemy. (this is what happens when you don't play test enough)
  6. If enough people enjoy this game I will a better one!
